transcript:
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning ma'am, Komal baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji aapke sath me baat kar rahi hai.
Executive: Ji ma'am aapki service chal rahi hai Shiv Shakti Automation and service ji Rudrapur se IndiaMART par.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji ma'am service kaise chal rahi hai koi issue to nahi aa raha hai service me abhi aapko?
Customer: No ma'am sab sahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Okay actually kal aapka ek ticket aaya tha IndiaMART par service miss call aayi thi aapki koi problem to nahi hai na service me abhi?
Customer: No ma'am sab to thik hai.
Executive: Okay thik hai buyleads jaise aap consume kar rahe ho wo conversion usme aa raha hai na aapko?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai ma'am mai aapka aise profile check kar rahi thi IndiaMART par aapko almost aap abhi one month hua hai aapko service use karte hue. To aap jaise jo service ko abhi provide kar rahe hain, mainly Uttarakhand me provide kar rahe hain ya complete all India aap check dekh rahe hain abhi?
Customer: All India dekh rahe hain ma'am.
Executive: All India dekh rahe ho. Thik hai aur jaise mai main product ki agar aapki baat karu. To main product aapka yahi rahega DC cooling fan rotary encoders in inductive proximity sensor yahi sari categories hai na aapki?
Customer: Ji hai aur bhi products hai.
Executive: Ji. In product abhi jo currently aapke IndiaMART par mapped hai lagbhag 52 product hai ma'am aapke added abhi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Jisme kafi sare aise abhi aapne service abhi recently start ki hai kafi sare product aise hai jisme aap log buylead matlab consume nahi kar rahe hain. Jaise aapka ye die head ho gaya electrical AMC service ho gaya isme buylead kafi kam matlab consume kar rahe ho aap log.
Customer: Ma'am jab recommended ya relevant aati hai to fir hum kar lete hain.
Executive: Ji. To buyleads isme filters aap apply kar rahe ho filters ka aapko matlab pura training yaha se bhi provide ki gayi hogi to filters ko leke koi issue to nahi hai na ma'am IndiaMART se?
Customer: Nahi ma'am wo sab kuch sikha diya tha.
Executive: Thik hai. Abhi jaise mai aapki service check kar rahi hu na ma'am aapke pass last 30 days me hamari side se do direct call gayi hai but dono call aapki miss hui hai.
Customer: Aapki taraf se?
Executive: Jaise IndiaMART pe user IndiaMART se aap se connect karte hain na online. To directly aise man lo maine aapko online profile check kiya Shiv Shakti Automation and service waha pe mujhe aapka aapko connect karna hai to waha se customer aapke PNS number pe call karta hai. To aapke pass jo calls aa rahi hai na last 30 days me hamari side se do call gayi hai aur aapne dono hi call miss hui hai aapki ye.
Executive: To isme mujhe janna hai jo matlab primary number hai wo owner hai wo service handle kar rahe hain abhi ya nahi kar rahe hain IndiaMART ki?
Customer: Primary number se to koi pick up nahi karta hai ye secondary number se hi call hum pick karte hain.
Executive: To ma'am aapne IndiaMART ka jo calls aap aa rahi hai aap try karo jo bhi call online aati hai na aapke pass IndiaMART se aap us call ko answer karo kyuki wo online customer aapka catalog dekh kar wo aapko samne se connect kar raha hai. Thik hai baki mai aapko number bata deti hu jis number se call aayega to wo number aap save kar lo taki in future aap calls aur miss na karo. Thik hai mai number bata deti hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Abhi jo IndiaMART par aap logo ne PNS me apne number add kiye hain do number add kiye hain to do hi main number hai ma'am aapka aur sir ka?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai aap ye number save kar lo mai number bata rahi hu 080
Customer: 080
Executive: 42
Customer: 42
Executive: 99
Customer: 79
Executive: Nahi nahi 99
Customer: Okay 99
Executive: Again 4299
Customer: 4299
Executive: Thik hai ye number aap save kar lo agar online koi bhi customer aapka profile IndiaMART ke through check karega aur waha se agar aapko directly call karega na to aapki mobile screen pe yahi number show karega ma'am. To ye calls fir aapki miss nahi hongi.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai aur baki isme jaise aapka catalog chal raha hai abhi. Ek minute hold pe rahiyega.
Executive: Abhi is week me aapne char din jaise buylead ma'am consume kiye hain na isse jaise thoda sa mai aapko bata deti hu jo buylead aap consume kar rahe ho usme aap try karo ki aap recent ki jo leads aa rahi hai na aap wo consume karo. Jaise customer ne abhi requirement agar dali hai to aur aap isme last aapne 27 ko kal ek buylead aaj aapne ek buylead purchase ki hai usse pehle aapne 23rd ko ki thi ma'am. Pichle teen char din se buylead koi bhi consume nahi hui hai to aap log ye try karo ki regular base pe do ya teen buylead aap log consume karo yaha se. Usse aapki activity bhi bani rahegi aur aapki visibility bhi IndiaMART me better rahegi aur conversion bhi usme aapko aata rahega.
Executive: Hello. Thik hai? Ji thik hai to abhi service apna use karo baki mai fir ticket yaha se close kar deti hu feedback aapke pass aayega to aap usko ma'am yes kar dijiyega thik hai?
Customer: Thik.
Executive: Thik hai ma'am thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer missed direct calls from IndiaMART.

- Not consuming buyleads regularly.



Resolution:

- Executive provided the direct call number to save.

- Suggested consuming recent buyleads regularly.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on the ticket.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, missed calls, catalog
